description: Link Augment: Reduces Armor Rating by 25% on enemies targeted by Link.

description: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting their weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

description: Sound Quake Augment: Forgoes channeling to create a shockwave that deals 10x Damage at the epicenter, gradually weakening as it expands out.
name: Resonating Quake

description: +15% Chance to deal Electrical Damage when shield struck by melee enemies.,+20 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity
name: Retribution

description: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
name: Rifle Ammo Mutation

description: Increased Rifle Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup
name: Rifle Scavenger

description: Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their Maximum Health restored.
name: Rift Haven

description: Charge attacks now step through the rift to attack enemies up to 5m away
name: Rift Strike

description: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.
name: Rift Torrent

description: Blade Storm Augment: Blade Storm attacks increase your Melee Counter by 1.Passive: +10s Combo Duration
name: Rising Storm

description: On Dodge:Become invulnerable for 2s and remove all Status Effects. 12s cooldown.
name: Rolling Guard

description: Rumblers Augment: Atlas becomes a Rumbler with Rock Armor that can absorb up to 350 Damage.
name: Rumbled

description: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.
name: Safeguard

description: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3s.
name: Safeguard Switch

description: Pull Augment: Steals up to 10 Energy from the target.
name: Sapping Reach

description: Silence Augment: Finisher Damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.
name: Savage Silence

description: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases Casting Speed of Decoy by 20%
name: Savior Decoy

description: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their Armor by 35% for 2s.
name: Seeking Shuriken

description: On Kill:+12.5% Critical Damage when Aiming for 2s
name: Sharpened Bullets

description: Methodical strikes and high impact combos.
name: Shattering Storm

description: Increases Companion Health and Armor.,+50 Health,+30 Armor
name: Shepherd

description: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Each Shadow within 50m take 3% of the Damage done to Nekros in his stead.
name: Shield Of Shadows

description: Polarize Augment: Increases the time for the target's Shields to regenerate by 4s.
name: Shield Overload

description: Fast spinning attacks and staggering strikes.
name: Shimmering Blight

description: Shock Augment: Hold to cast will grant all allies within 15m an additional 50% <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to their attacks for 28s.
name: Shock Trooper

description: Speed Augment: Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of Speed will take 75 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage with guaranteed proc.
name: Shocking Speed

description: Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
name: Shotgun Ammo Mutation

description: Increased Shotgun Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup
name: Shotgun Scavenger

description: On Kill:+16.5% Critical Damage when Aiming for 2s
name: Shrapnel Shot

description: +5% Fire Rate (x2 for Bows),+0.2 Punch Through
name: Shred

description: Radial Blind Augment: Enemies blinded are marked on the Minimap for 3s.
name: Signal Flare

description: Reduces the chance an enemy will hear gunfire by 25%.
name: Silent Battery

description: Absorb Augment: Creates a ring every 3s that drags in enemies at 9m/s.
name: Singularity

description: Strong, focused attacks with multi-hit spins.
name: Sinking Talon

description: Twirling, acrobatic slashes with a refined touch.
name: Slicing Feathers

description: Smite Augment: Hold to cast will grant all allies within 15m an additional 50% <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage to their attacks for 28s.
name: Smite Infusion

description: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies within 8m for 2s.
name: Smoke Shadow

description: Converts unused ammo pickups into Sniper ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
name: Sniper Ammo Mutation

description: Increased Sniper Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup
name: Sniper Scavenger

description: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy Armor is reduced by 35% for 2s.
name: Sonic Fracture

description: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% Health. Nekros's Energy will be consumed.
name: Soul Survivor

description: An outlandish style with sweeping attacks.
name: Sovereign Outcast

description: Spectrorage Augment: Enemies that die within Spectrorage have a 20% chance to drop an Energy Orb.
name: Spectrosiphon

description: Increases weapon draw and holstering speed.,+20% Holster Speed
name: Speed Holster

description: On Hit:+16.7% Multishot-30% Accuracy for 0s. Stacks up to 4 times
name: Split Flights

description: On Status Effect: +0.2 Range for 4s. Stacks up to 2 times.

description: Increase damage by +40%,if the target is over 45m away.

description: On Reload:+12.5% Fire Rate when Aiming for 2s
name: Spring-Loaded Chamber

description: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.
name: Staggering Shield

description: Blocking reduces damage taken from enemy abilities by 10%.
name: Stand Ground

description: Charge Attacks electrify nearby enemies for <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage equal to 30% of weapon damage.

description: +3 Enemy Radar,+2% Aim Glide/Wall Latch Duration
name: Stealth Drift

description: Melee Weapon damage increased.,+10% Melee Damage
name: Steel Charge

description: Increased Pistol Ammo recovery.,Dead maggots within 5m are consumed, restoring 1% Missing Health.
name: Strain Consume

description: Melee Attacks gain +5% Critical Damage per Cyst.
name: Strain Infection

description: On 2 Hits within 0.2s:+7.5% Fire Rate for 1s
name: Sudden Justice

description: Steady chopping strikes with focused damage.
name: Sundering Weave

description: Reduces the chance an enemy will hear gunfire by 25%.
name: Suppress

description: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your Melee Counter by 1.
name: Surging Dash

description: Gain +1 energy, upon replenishing shields completely after they have been deactivated.
name: Surplus Diverters

description: +5% Heavy Attack Wind Up Speed,+1s Combo Duration
name: Swift Momentum

description: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no Energy cost while Airborne.
name: Swing Line

description: With Melee Equipped:,+2.5% Mobility,+0.3 Sprint Speed
name: Sword Alone

description: +50% Bonus Damage on final shot. Requires Magazine 6 or higher.
name: Synth Charge

description: Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind Damage by 40%. Damage resets upon being on ground for 2s.

description: On Hit:+5% Accuracy when Aiming for 2s
name: Targeting Subsystem

description: Smoke Screen Augment: Blinds enemies within 1m for 3s.
name: Tear Gas

description: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% Health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.
name: Tectonic Fracture

description: Virulence Augment: Hitting 4 enemies with Virulence grants 70% Primary Weapon Critical Chance for 9s.

description: Increased Pistol Ammo recovery.,+25% Critical Damage when inside the Marked Zone.

description: Slam Attacks in the Marked Zone pull all enemies within 6m.

description: Tesla Nervos Augment: While a target has a Nervos attached, any damage dealt to it will be absorbed by the Nervos and channeled into a 5m burst of <DT_ELECTRICITY> Electricity on death.
name: Tesla Bank

description: Grenades tether up to 2 enemies from 4m away.
name: Tether Grenades

description: Enemies explode on death, dealing 20 <DT_MAGNETIC>Magnetic Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1.5m radius.

description: Highlights mods through the environment as well as the Minimap.,+7 Loot Radar
name: Thief'S Wit

description: +25% chance charged Projectiles explode,-15% Magazine Capacity
name: Thundermiter

description: Tidal Surge Augment: Clears Status Effects and grants 8s of Proc Immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.
name: Tidal Impunity

description: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 200% Health and 200% Damage.Reactivating will cause him to slam the floor and knockdown enemies in 15m.
name: Titanic Rumbler

description: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 8m benefit from Eclipse.
name: Total Eclipse

description: +2.2% to Bullet Jump,+2.2% Aim Glide/Wall Latch Duration,+25% <DT_POISON>Toxin on Bullet Jump

description: A mix of sweeping attacks with precise strikes.
name: Twirling Spire

description: Energy Vampire Augment: Excess Energy replenishes Shields by 85%.
name: Vampire Leech

description: On Kill:-25% Shield Recharge Delay for 3s,-6.2% from Health Orbs
name: Vanquished Prey

description: Venari Augment: Venari dies in Khora's place. Respawn timer increased to 150s. Killing enemies decreases the timer by 1s.
name: Venari Bodyguard

description: Spores Augment: Hold to cast will grant all allies within 15m an additional 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage to their attacks for 28s.
name: Venom Dose

description: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 Damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc while Health damage will cause a <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Proc.

description: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 2.

description: Killing a flying enemy creates a lightning trap from their remains, lasting 2s,+0.3 'Sequence'

description: Enemies explode on death, dealing 50 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1m radius.

description: Warding Halo Augment: 35% of the casting cost returned based on how much protection is left.
name: Ward Recovery

description: Thurible Augment: Allies in range take 15% less Damage while channeling Thurible and grant 0.2 additional Energy charge whenever damaged.

description: Secondary Fire will shoot with +200% Fire Rate until the magazine is empty. Killing 2 or more enemies will refund 25% of the ammo.
